features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Users can sign up, log in, and log out.

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Users can add and remove items from their cart.

features.name: Checkout Process
features.description: Securely pay for items in the cart.

stories.name: As a user, I want to sign up with my email.
As a user, I want to log in.

nfrs.requirement: Pages should load in under 2 seconds.
All user data must be encrypted.
